document_data.mainbody:
he Elf domain was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like clerics with elven spells and powers.
Their ability to use ranged weapons at close range improved.
Novice spellcasters were able to use the true strike, cats grace, and snare spells. Clerics of some experience could cast tree stride, commune with nature, and find the path. Those that were masters of this domain had access to liveoak, sunburst, and antipathy.
